Ertuğrul Bey is waiting in the tent.
Prince Theodore has arrived, my lord.
pleasure to meet you, Mr. Ertuğrul. Here

text: Size daha önce de sulh teklifiyle geldik. Ama maalesef hepsi bozuldu.
english: We have approached you before with a peace offer. But unfortunately, they all broke down.

text: Bu kez daha ciddi ve kalıcı bir anlaşma için geldim.
english: This time I've come for a more serious and lasting agreement .
First of all, we hope you will accept our gifts.
As you said... you have come here

text: ...daha önce de sulh anlaşmaları için geldiniz.

english: We didn't turn any of them away.

text: Sebebi de tekfurlarınızın ve komutanlarınızın ihanetiydi.
english: The reason was the betrayal of your rulers and commanders. The

text: Size verebileceğim en büyük güvence olarak kendim...
english: greatest assurance I can give you is that I have come ...
...as the heir to the Byzantine throne .
Mongols will turn their attention to Anatolia .

text: Sizi de, bizi de yok etmeye çalışacaklar.
english: They will try to destroy both you and us.

text: Halbuki bu topraklarda sulh içinde yaşama imkânımız varken...
english: But why should we perish when we have the opportunity to live in peace in these lands

text: İhaneti ve sulhu bozmayı kimse göze alamayacaktır.
english: one will dare to commit treason and disrupt the peace .
You can be sure of that.
We never turn down an outstretched hand of peace

text: Ve sulh şartları yerine getirildiği müddetçe de...
english: And as long as the terms of peace are fulfilled...
we will treat the other side fairly.
As long as they are honorable... we will
treat our enemies fairly . Even when

text: ...İmparator Romen Diyojen'i yenip onu esir aldığında bile...
english: defeated Emperor Romanos Diogenes at Malazgirt and took him prisoner, he
welcomed him kindly and treated him well. I know

text: Aynı asaletin sizde de olduğunu biliyorum.
Bu yüzden sizinle sulh anlaşması yapmak bizim için onurdur.
english: Therefore, it is an honor for us to conclude a peace agreement with you .
agreement in the name of our emperor .

text: Ben de uç beyi olarak Selçuklu Devleti'nin ve sultanının...
english: I, as a frontier lord, with the authority granted to me by the Seljuk State and its Sultan,

text: Söğüt'e yerleştiğimizde oraya Hanlı Pazar'dan daha büyük bir pazar kuracağız.
english: When we settle in Söğüt, we will build a market there that is even bigger than Hanlı Bazaar.

text: Rum tüccarlar orada diledikleri gibi ticaretlerini yapabilirler.
english: Greek merchants can conduct their trade there as they wish.

text: Can ve mal güvenliklerinden biz mesulüz.
english: We are responsible for the safety of lives and property.

text: Sulh daim olduğu sürece yeni kuracağınız pazara...

english: we will give you all the support we can for the new market you are establishing, Mr. Ertuğrul. May
our peace last forever, Ertuğrul Bey.
So, what happened next, Grandma? That's all
from me. Let your father tell you what happens next
after the party at the inn this evening

text: Beni toya mı götürürsünüz nene? (Bebek sesi)
english: you taking me to the wedding, grandma? (Baby sound)

text: Yaraşır senin gibi yiğit bir beye Gündüz.
english: It suits a brave gentleman like you, Gündüz. You

text: Hak edersin sen toyda olmayı. (Bebek sesi)
english: deserve to be at the wedding. (Baby voice)

text: Bey olarak toya mı davet ederler beni?
english: invite me to the wedding as a gentleman?

text: Sahi derim ya oğul, gayrı vakti gelmiştir.
english: Indeed, I say to you, son, the time has come.

text: Herkes seni orada bey olarak görmek ister.
english: Everyone wants to see you as a gentleman there .
I'm going to the wedding too!
I will strike fear into the hearts of the tyrants!
I will be a source of hope for the oppressed!

text: Babama yaraşır yiğit bir bey olacağım!
english: I will become a valiant gentleman worthy of my father!
How happy Hayme Ana was. May
God always keep you smiling. May God grant them a

text: Nikea prensi bizzat kendi geldiğine göre...
english: the Prince of Nicaea has come in person...
...they must be in serious trouble, my lord.

text: Ya gardaş, imparatorun elinde tekfur mu bıraktık ki?
english: Brother, did we leave any local ruler in the hands of the emperor ? As a

text: O da son çare oğlunu gönderdi. Ne yapsın?
english: last resort, he sent his son. What else could he do?
Their troubles stem from their fear of the Mongols, Bamsi. They know very well that if
...the Mongols would devastate Anatolia in an instant ...
...and burn and destroy themselves as well .

text: Bu sebeple bizimle sulh yapmak isterler.
english: That's why they want to make peace with us.

text: Prens Teodor sulh meselesinde gayet ciddiydi beyim.
english: Prince Theodore was very serious about the peace matter, my lord .
...they won't dare break the peace, my lord .

text: Bana da öyle gelir Artuk Bey.
english: That's what I think too, Mr. Artuk.

text: ...ne olur ne olmaz, temkini elden bırakmayalım.
english: , let's not let our guard down.
My lord, these infidels, after suffering defeat after defeat,
have realized that hostility towards us is futile.

text: Allah vere inşallah Moğol zebanileri de...
english: God willing, even the Mongol demons...
...if the world desires peace and tranquility...
... they will learn not to harbor enmity towards the Turks. When a
...they'll all learn what's coming to them . Rest

text: Beyim, ahali göç için canhıraş çalışmakta.
english: My lord, the people are working frantically to prepare for migration . Okay then

text: Siz de ahalinin yanında olun Turgut.
english: You should stand with the people, Turgut.

text: Olun ki bir ihtiyaçları olursa karşılarsınız.
english: Be there so that you can meet their needs if they ever have any.

text: İmdi ürkek bir serçeye dönmüşsün ulu Kam.
english: Now you've become like a timid sparrow, great Kam.
What happened, Kam? Come on then

text: De bana Kam! Gardaşıma ne oldu?
english: me, Kam! What happened to my brother?
...set a trap for Ertuğrul and his mother...

text: (Erkek) Bir el at, bir el at.
english: (Man) Give me a hand, give me a hand.

text: Hele gelesin gardaş. Yanlarına varıp ahval öğrenelim.
english: brother. Let's go and find out what's happening.
glad to see you, we're glad to see you.

text: Toparlandı beyim. Akşama kalmaz her şey tamam olur inşallah.
english: 's recovered, sir. Hopefully everything will be ready by evening.

text: Kağnılara koşulacak hayvanlarımızın hepsi de semizdir maşallah.
english: the animals we have harnessed to the ox carts are well-fed, thank God.

text: Dağda, belde yağ gibi akar giderler.
english: They flow smoothly like butter in the mountains and valleys.

text: Hele Turgut Bey'inle Bamsı Alpbaşı'na uzatasın kızım.
english: Especially hand it to Turgut Bey and Bamsı Alpbaşı, my daughter.

text: Sağ olasın, sağ olasın. Su gibi aziz olasın inşallah.
english: Thank you, thank you. May you be as precious as water, God willing. May

text: Su dökeyim mi sana da Turgut Bey?
english: pour some water on you too, Mr. Turgut?

text: Sen diğer çalışanlara da su veresin.
english: You should give water to the other employees as well.

text: Eh, eksik gedik bir şey var mıdır?
english: Well, is there anything missing or incomplete?

text: Kağnılar yeterince ağır. Yüklerimize yeter hepsi.
english: The ox carts are heavy enough. They're all enough for our loads. -Good morning my baby.
-The tents have also started to be dismantled.
We'll deal with each of them individually.
(Music - Exciting) In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the
of Allah, the Almighty, who creates with a single command, and fills our hearts with faith, with His 99 names. May
went as an envoy to the Mongol Khan Ögeday and... ...

text: ...sağ salim döndün Ertuğrul Bey. Çok şükür.
english: you returned safe and sound. Thank god. You dealt with the

text: Burada da Moğol casuslarının hakkından geldin.
english: Mongol spies here too . Thanks, gentlemen
Some of the Mongol spies among us have been purged.
... the Mongol threat is not yet over.
...the peace treaty sealed with him is invalid.
The Mongols will attack Anatolia again. Just as

text: Biz bugüne kadar nasıl bir arada olup...

english: overcome all threats until today, we

text: ...Moğol tehdidini de Allah'ın izniyle bertaraf ederiz.
english: will also overcome the Mongol threat, God willing.

text: Biz yeni ve kutlu bir yola çıktık.
english: We have embarked on a new and blessed path.
With God's permission, when we settle in Söğüt ...
...we will expand our family even further.
We overcame many obstacles to get here. We
Our blessed path is not limited to Söğüt. Just as
the door opened from our ancestral homelands brought
door we will open in Söğüt will carry
us to all corners of the world.

text: ...at ayağı külük, ozan dili çevik olur derler.
english: ... they say a horse's hoof is like a shovel, and a poet's tongue is nimble . Sing

text: Bize ata yurtlardan deyişler söyleyesin de...
english: us verses from our ancestral lands, O
poet, so that our hearts may be gladdened.
"The banner has been raised and struck"
The banner has been raised and struck" "The
"How will he escape, how will he catch him?"
"How will he escape, how will he catch him?"
My anger has come upon me!" "
chopped off the heads of the warriors!" "
"I chopped off the heads of the Alps!"

"I cut off the heads of the Alps"
"I chopped off the heads of the Alps!"
"I chopped off the heads of the Alps!"
"I chopped off the heads of the Alps!"

text: ...dürüst ve mert damarından yakalayıp, pazarında yer tuttum.
english: I seized upon Ertuğrul's honest and upright nature and secured my place in the market.
I gained his trust. I even went into

text: Otağına girip, hatunu ve anasıyla tanış bile oldum.
english: his tent and met his wife and mother .

text: Sevdiğim ne varsa elimden aldın Ertuğrul.
english: You took everything I loved from me, Ertuğrul.
I will come with dark spirits. I
will wipe out your lineage... and make a
tent for myself from their skins .
I will send provisions from my children.
(During the day) You mentioned the Templars.

text: Gündüz Bey, dört bir yanımızı sarmışlardı.
english: Mr. Gündüz and his men had surrounded us on all sides. The

text: Tapınakçı kefereler, çevremizde bir ocak gibiydi.
english: Templar infidels were like a fire burning all around us.
With our faith as strong as steel...
...with our unwavering courage, our unyielding strength...

text: ...ve dahi kat kat zırhları biçen pusatlarımızla...
english: ...and with our weapons that cut through layers of armor ...
How did we get from there to here, Dad?

text: Atam Süleyman Şah vefat ettikten sonra...
english: After my ancestor Suleyman Shah passed away...
...we set out on this journey with those who believed in us, Gündüz.
That's how it is, Gündüz. It

text: Gardaşlarından ayrılmak zor oldu, değil mi baba?
english: was hard to leave your brothers, was n't it, Dad? Isn't that possible,

text: Ömrümün en acı, en zor günleriydi.
english: most painful, most difficult days of my life.

text: Baba, sen çok zor günler yaşamışsın.
english: Dad, you've been through some very difficult times.
That's what happened, Gündüz, that's what happened.

text: Bizim gayemiz rıza-i ilahi olduğu için…
english: Because our aim is to please God…

text: …Allah da bize zor günlerimizde medet eyledi.
english: ...God helped us during our difficult times . Thank God

text: Çok şükür bizler de bu günlere eriştik.
Yarın göç kervanı bizden evvel yola koyulacak.
english: Tomorrow the migration caravan will set off before us.
We will first visit the cemetery…
…and then meet the caravan in Sarı Vadi (Yellow Valley) .

text: Bundan gayrı da hep beraber Söğüt’e varacağız inşallah.
english: After this, we will all arrive in Söğüt together, God willing.
(All at once) The command is yours, my lord.

text: Bu Noyan soysuzundan kurtulduk mu dersin?
english: you think we've finally gotten rid of this Noyan scoundrel? Will they ever leave us alone now
Noyan has no intention of giving up, mother.

text: Lakin bu sefer ordusuyla Anadolu’yu istila etmeye gelecek.
english: But this time, he will come to invade Anatolia with his army. So
what are we going to do?

text: İmdiye dek ne ettiysek onu etmeye devam edeceğiz ana.
english: We'll continue doing what we've been doing up until now, mother. We

text: Ne zulmedeceğiz ne de zulme boyun eğeceğiz.
english: will neither oppress nor submit to oppression.

text: İsterse cihanın tüm ordularını toplayıp gelsin…
english: Even if he gathers all the armies of the world and comes...

text: …lakin bu soysuzun bize çektirdiği acılar dün gibi aklımdadır.
english: …but the pain this scoundrel inflicted upon us is as clear in my mind as if it were yesterday.
I'm afraid we'll go through the same things again.

text: En çok da evlatlarımıza musallat olmasından.
english: Most of all, because it afflicts our children . Oh God, please don't let

text: Allah’ım bize aynı acıları yaşatmasın ya Rabbi.
english: us experience the same pain again . Rest

text: Geleceği varsa göreceği de vardır elbet.
english: If it has a future, it will surely see it.

text: O soysuza karşı Söğüt'te alınacak tüm tedbirleri alacağız.
english: We will take all necessary measures against that scoundrel in Söğüt.

text: İmdi Allah’ın izniyle Söğüt’e göç ederiz.
english: Now, God willing, we will migrate to Söğüt.
We lost loved ones on this blessed path.
My father, Suleiman Shah, has passed away. We
We laid him to rest in these lands. We endured
all the suffering and did not deviate from our path. It was all to
I wish they could have lived to see this day.

text: Hepsinin acısı ayrı ayrı içimi dağlar ana.
english: Each of their pains tears me apart inside, mother.
But the blessed path is full of trials. The

text: Sevdiklerimizin acısı da bizim için bir imtihandı.
english: pain of losing our loved ones was also a test for us.
With God's grace, we endured the suffering and
Our efforts were rewarded with the grace of God.
Now Söğüt will be our homeland, mother.

text: Söğüt’te merhamet ve adaletle yakacağımız kutlu ocağın aydınlığını…
english: The light of the blessed hearth we will light in Söğüt with mercy and justice… …

text: …inşallah evlatlarımız cihanın dört bir yanına taşıyacaklar.
english: God willing, our children will carry it to all corners of the world.
God willing, son, God willing. Let
me go check on my children, mother.

text: Sütten ak yüzlü, gök gözlü oğlum benim.
english: My son, with a face as pure as milk and sky-blue eyes. Go

text: Aslan yeleli, kurt bakışlı oğlum benim.
english: My son, with a lion's mane and wolf's eyes.
You were brought forth with blessed dreams from your noble ancestors. You were named after my ancestor,

text: Ulu bahar toyunda doğdun görklü anandan.
english: You were born of your glorious mother at the magnificent spring festival . May you be blessed to grow up in the

text: İnşallah kutlu Söğüt ocağında büyümek nasip olsun sana.
english: sacred Söğüt hearth, God willing . May valiant men with

text: Bir yanında bileği pek, yüreği mert yiğitler…
english: strong arms and courageous hearts march on one side, and revered

text: …bir yanında ağzı dualı ulular yürüsün inşallah.
english: elders with prayers on their lips march on the other, God willing. Let
armies be assembled to pursue him. May
the paths of righteousness be opened before you.

text: Ey oğul, kutlu Söğüt ocağında, aldığın ateşi…
english: O son, in the blessed hearth of Söğüt, carry the fire you have received…
the seas belong to the seas, and the rivers to the rivers. Let the

text: Mavi gök çadırın, güneş bayrağın olsun.
english: blue sky be your tent, and the sun your flag. Let your

text: Tek gayen rıza-i ilahi olsun oğul.
english: only goal be to please God, my son.

text: Ben de, gardaşlarım da seni çok özleriz…
english: My brothers and I will miss you very much…
we will long for your warmth, mother.

text: İmdi yeni yurdumuza varırız. Lakin gözün arkada kalmasın.
english: Now we arrive at our new homeland. But don't worry about a thing. I will be the

text: Gardaşlarıma en iyi şekilde ağabeylik edeceğim.
english: best older brother to my brothers .

text: Seni ziyaret etmek için yine geleceğiz.
english: We will come to visit you again.

text: Sen hep bizden büyük bir bey olmamızı isterdin.
english: You always wanted us to become great gentlemen.

text: Hamdolsun ana. Sana ve babama yaraşır...
english: Thank God, mother. We will become valiant gentlemen, worthy of you and my father
time to go. Come on. My
Your absence burns like a fire in my heart. It
burns and consumes me from the inside. It's

text: Gayrı Söğüt’e göç vakti gelmiştir Halime’m.
english: time to move to Söğüt, Halime. The time has come to light the fire we've been dreaming of together for
Rest in peace. I will raise
our children in a way that is worthy of the blood of their ancestors...
...and the pure milk of their mothers . Rest
I was pleased with you, Halime. May
God be pleased with you too. May your

text: Dilerim Rabbim, adı görklü yüce peygamberimiz…
…Muhammet Mustafa yüzü suyu hürmetine bizi ahirette de buluştursun.
english: for the sake of our glorious and exalted Prophet Muhammad Mustafa, He will reunite us in the hereafter.

text: Biz de şehitlerimizin ruhuna Fatiha okuyup mezarlarını suladık.
english: We also recited Fatiha for the souls of our martyrs and watered their graves.
You did well, my brave men.
Today, our cause is entrusted to us by them. May

text: Varacağımız Söğüt’te de birliğimiz, dirliğimiz daim olsun.
english: our unity and solidarity endure in Söğüt, where we will arrive .
-Peace be upon you. -And peace be upon you.
We Mongols are Tengri's punishments on Earth.
If only they knew how to submit…
…if only they weren't drowning in a sea of ​​arrogance…
…Tengri wouldn't have sent us against them .

text: Noyan! Etimiz, kanımız, canımız sana feda olsun.
english: Noyan! We would sacrifice our flesh, our blood, our lives for you.

text: İmdi Anadolu’yu istila etmek için yollara düşeriz.
english: Now we set out to invade Anatolia.

text: Bana, Noyan’a itaat etmemenin bedelini ödeyecekler.
english: They will pay the price for not obeying me, Noyan.

text: Sizlerin bana ölümüne bağlı olduğunuzu bilirim.
english: I know you are all devoted to me to the death.
But that's not enough. Even if

text: Benim tenim, Gobi Çölü’nde yaprak gibi kurusa da…
english: my skin withers like a leaf in the Gobi Desert…
…you will not turn back from your path.
You are my bravest commanders. When
…they will stand before us like a wall.

text: Lakin duvarın sağlamlığı, onu koruyanların cesaretine bağlıdır.
english: But the strength of the wall depends on the courage of those who protect it.
First, we will break the Turks' spirit.
…and the traps set by those who pledge allegiance to us…
…we will turn Anatolia into a bloodbath. We
will make the Turks kill each other so fiercely...
... we will collect their heads like picking pears from a tree.

text: Bir savaşçı için en büyük sevinç zafer kazanmaktır!
english: For a warrior, the greatest joy is victory! To
…is to deprive them of their possessions, of their loved ones!
Then we will come and get drunk on the ruined table of the Seljuks …
We will celebrate our victory! May
You've overcome many challenging roads. The

text: Gün geldi sevdiğinizi yitirdiniz, gün geldi Alplerinizi şehit verdiniz.
english: day came when you lost your loved one, the day came when you lost your brave soldiers in the Alps.

text: Lakin sarsılmaz bir kararlılıkla gönlünüzdeki imana bağlanarak…
english: But with unwavering determination, clinging to the faith in your hearts…
you did not abandon your cause.

text: Siz kutlu bir davaya adanmış neferlersiniz.
english: You are soldiers dedicated to a noble cause . You should make

text: Allah’ın davasını dava edinip, bu davayı nefsinizden evla bilirsiniz.
english: God's cause your own, and consider it more important than your own desires .

text: İmdi büyük fetihlere atılacak adımların eşiğindesiniz inşallah.
english: Now, God willing, you are on the threshold of taking steps towards great conquests .

text: Allah’tan tek dileğim, çıktığımız bu yolda rıza-i ilahi için…
english: My only wish from God is that on this path we have embarked upon, we may serve
the cause of God's word, for the sake of God's pleasure .

text: Son nefesime kadar adaleti, merhameti, umudu…
english: Until my last breath, I will strive to spread justice, compassion, and hope… to all corners of the

text: Yüce Allah bir ayet-i kerimesinde buyurur ki…
english: Allah Almighty says in a verse of His holy book: "...

text: …”Şüphesiz iman edenler, hicret edenler ve Allah yolunda cihat edenler…
english: Indeed, those who believe, emigrate, and strive in the cause of Allah...
it is they who can hope for Allah's mercy."

text: Siz de Allah yoluna cihat gayesiyle yola çıkarsınız.
english: You too set out on your journey with the intention of waging jihad in the path of Allah. May

text: İnşallah Allah’ın rahmeti sizin üzerinize olacaktır.
english: God's mercy be upon you, Insha'Allah.

text: Allah’tan niyazım, gideceğiniz yurda bir güneş gibi doğup…
english: My prayer to God is that you will rise like the sun in the land you are going to … and
Now it's time to say goodbye.

text: Ben de kardeşlerimle Konya yoluna düşerim.
english: I too will set off for Konya with my brothers . We
You were our guide. You helped us
I will never forget your support and friendship.

text: Biz sizden razıyız, Allah da sizden razı olsun.
english: We are pleased with you, and may God be pleased with you too.

text: Ertuğrul Bey, sizler mazluma umut olup…
english: Ertuğrul Bey, you became a source of hope for the oppressed… and
You became the protector of the poor and the needy.

text: Sizin gayeniz Allah’ın davasına hizmet etmektir.
english: Your goal is to serve God's cause .

text: Bizim vazifemizse Allah’ın davasına hizmetkâr olana hizmet etmektir.
english: Our duty is to serve those who serve God's cause.

text: Lakin bilinsin ki bedenlerin uzaklaşması ayrılık değildir.
english: But let it be known that the separation of bodies is not the same as separation.

text: Gönülleri bir olanlar için ayrılık yoktur.
english: There is no separation for those whose hearts are united.

text: Sizler bizim gönlümüzde ve her daim duamızda olacaksınız.
english: You will always be in our hearts and in our prayers. Please

text: Siz de bu fakiri duanızda anasınız.
english: remember this poor man in your prayers.

text: Hoş kelamlarınızı yeniden işitmeyi canı gönülden isterim.

english: Wow, you've grown so much, you've blossomed and become so big!

text: Sen gayrı bala Gündüz değil, bey Gündüz’sün.
english: You are no longer little Gündüz, you are now Mr. Gündüz.
You will protect your two brothers…
…you will put horses on them and arm them with swords.

text: Kendin gibi yiğit bir bey yapacaksın.
english: You will create a lord as valiant as yourself.

text: Ne kadar bir arada olurlarsa o kadar güçlü olurlar.
english: The more they stick together, the stronger they become.

text: Hepiniz babanıza layık birer evlat olursunuz inşallah.
english: I hope you will all become worthy children to your father.
I will not forget your advice, sir.

text: Ben de ağabeylik vazifemi layıkıyla yerine getireceğim.
english: I will also fulfill my duties as an older brother to the best of my ability .
My brothers and I will be worthy sons to our father .

text: Allah yolunuzu açık etsin Alpler. Allah’a emanet olun.
english: God bless your journey, Alps. May God protect you.
can't keep the people waiting. We

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Çıktığımız yol, nizam-ı âlem için gaza yoludur.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) The path we have embarked upon is the path of holy war for the order of the world.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Gök yeleli atlarımızla ufukları aşana dek…
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Until we cross the horizons with our sky-maned horses…
…we will not stop until we spread God's justice .

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Yolumuz yedi iklime, bütün denizlere, bütün ırmaklaradır.
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Our path leads to the seven climates, to all the seas, to all the rivers.

text: (Ertuğrul dış ses) Yolumuz en yüce hedefe...
english: (Ertuğrul's voiceover) Our path leads to the highest goal...
(Ibn Arabi's voiceover) In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Şüphesiz biz sana apaçık bir fetih verdik.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) Indeed, We have granted you a clear victory.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Ta ki Allah senin geçmiş ve gelecek günahlarını bağışlasın…
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) So that Allah may forgive your past and future sins…

text: …ve Allah sana şanlı bir zaferle yardım etsin.
english: …and that Allah may grant you a glorious victory.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) O, inananların imanlarını kat kat arttırmaları için…
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) He is the One who
sends down peace and security into the hearts of believers, so that their faith may increase manifold.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Göklerin ve yerin orduları Allah’ındır.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) The armies of the heavens and the earth belong to Allah.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Allah hakkıyla bilendir, hüküm ve hikmet sahibidir.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) God is the All- Knowing, the Possessor of judgment and wisdom.

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) Bütün bunlar Allah’ın, inanan erkek ve kadınları…
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) All this is so that Allah may admit believing men and women
into gardens of Paradise, wherein rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, and that He may

text: (İbn-i Arabi dış ses) İşte bu, Allah katında büyük bir başarıdır.
english: (Ibn Arabi's voiceover) This is indeed a great achievement in the sight of God.
